title: The Lost Treasures Of Alexandria[NDS](simmyboy80)
description:
This is The Lost Treasures Of Alexandria  for Nintendo DS , this ROM has been tested on M3i Zero with the latest firmware (WOOD M3 1.25)and emulator for PC (DESMUME)and working OK

If this works for your flashcart (r4i DSST etc......) please post comment below for others and do the same if doesnt work

Any game requests post a comment below and I will see what I can do

And always please help seed as limited bandwidth and speed



ROM INFO

Genre:Puzzle

Languages:English

ENJOY
